SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config.server

Class ListenerConfig

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.config.server.ListenerConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ListenerConfig extends ConfigFoundation
Listener configuration for SMTP ports.

This class provides type safe access to listener-specific configuration.

Each SMTP port (smtp, secure, submission) can have its own configuration.

See Also:
